attributes.action: Remove the Chief Whip Mr Andrew Mitchell from Public Office.
attributes.additional_details:
In a week when two brave Police Officers were murdered in the line of duty while serving the country,
we the undersigned believe that Mr Mitchell should be removed from his post and public office immediately and replaced with a more suitable person who is willing to recognise and respect the Police Service, instead of undermining and disrespecting those who work daily to uphold the law in this country.
